verbs.description: NEW YORK ( AP ) — Dozens of demonstrators in New York City [V: are] protesting NBC 's decision to allow Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump to host " Saturday Night Live . "

NEW YORK ( AP ) — [ARG0: Dozens of demonstrators in New York City] are [V: protesting] [ARG1: NBC 's decision to allow Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump to host " Saturday Night Live] . "
